metadata.name: Suspicious TSCON Start as SYSTEM
metadata.comment: Detects a tscon.exe start as LOCAL SYSTEM

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('authori')) OR contains(lower(actor.user.name), lower('autori'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\tscon.exe')))

output.summary: Detects a tscon.exe start as LOCAL SYSTEM
